00049 class PhysMotionState : public btMotionState {
00050     private:
00051         friend class ActorBase;
00052         Ogre::SceneNode* snode;
00053         btTransform initposition;
00054 
00055     public:
00056         PhysMotionState();
00057         PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00058         virtual ~PhysMotionState();
00059         void SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode);
00060         void SetPosition(PhysVector3 position);
00061 
00062         virtual void getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const;
00063         virtual void setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans);
00064 };

00069 ActorBase::ActorBase (PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group, PhysWorld* World)
00070 {
00071     this->GameWorld = World;
00072     this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00073     this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->getRootSceneNode()->addChild(this->node);
00074     this->MotionState = new PhysMotionState(this->node);
00075     this->Shape = new btEmptyShape();
00076     this->CreateEntity(name, file, group);
00077 }
00078 
00079 ActorBase::~ActorBase ()
00080 {
00081     delete MotionState;
00082     delete Shape;
00083 }
00084 
00085 void ActorBase::CreateTrimesh()
00086 {
00087     // Get the mesh from the entity
00088     Ogre::MeshPtr myMesh = entity->getMesh();
00089 
00090     // Get the submesh and associated data
00091     Ogre::SubMesh* subMesh = myMesh->getSubMesh(0);
00092 
00093     Ogre::IndexData*  indexData = subMesh->indexData;
00094     Ogre::VertexData* vertexData = subMesh->vertexData;
00095 
00096     // Get the position element
00097     const Ogre::VertexElement* posElem = vertexData->vertexDeclaration->findElementBySemantic(Ogre::VES_POSITION);
00098 
00099     // Get a pointer to the vertex buffer
00100     Ogre::HardwareVertexBufferSharedPtr vBuffer = vertexData->vertexBufferBinding->getBuffer(posElem->getSource());
00101 
00102     // Get a pointer to the index buffer
00103     Ogre::HardwareIndexBufferSharedPtr iBuffer = indexData->indexBuffer;
00104 
00105     // Get the number of triangles
00106     unsigned int triCount = indexData->indexCount/3;
00107 
00108     // Allocate space for the vertices and indices
00109     Ogre::Vector3* vertices = new Ogre::Vector3[vertexData->vertexCount];
00110     unsigned long* indices  = new unsigned long[indexData->indexCount];
00111 
00112     // Lock the vertex buffer (READ ONLY)
00113     unsigned char* vertex =   static_cast<unsigned char*>(vBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00114 
00115     float* pReal = NULL;
00116 
00117     for (size_t j = 0; j < vertexData->vertexCount; ++j, vertex += vBuffer->getVertexSize() )
00118     {
00119         posElem->baseVertexPointerToElement(vertex, &pReal);
00120         Ogre::Vector3 pt(pReal[0], pReal[1], pReal[2]);
00121         vertices[j] = pt;
00122     }
00123 
00124     vBuffer->unlock();
00125 
00126     size_t index_offset = 0;
00127 
00128     bool use32bitindexes = (iBuffer->getType() == Ogre::HardwareIndexBuffer::IT_32BIT);
00129 
00130     // Lock the index buffer (READ ONLY)
00131     unsigned long* pLong = static_cast<unsigned long*>(iBuffer->lock(Ogre::HardwareBuffer::HBL_READ_ONLY));
00132     unsigned short* pShort = reinterpret_cast<unsigned short*>(pLong);
00133 
00134     if (use32bitindexes)
00135     {
00136         for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00137         {
00138             indices[index_offset++] = pLong[k];
00139         }
00140     }
00141     else
00142     {
00143         for (size_t k = 0; k < triCount*3; ++k)
00144         {
00145          indices[index_offset++] = static_cast<unsigned long>(pShort[k]);
00146         }
00147     }
00148 
00149     iBuffer->unlock();
00150 
00151     // We now have vertices and indices ready to go
00152 
00153     // The Bullet triangle mesh
00154     btTriangleMesh* trimesh = new btTriangleMesh(use32bitindexes);
00155 
00156     // Setup the tri mesh
00157     btVector3 vert0, vert1, vert2;
00158     int i=0;
00159 
00160     // For every triangle
00161     for (unsigned int y=0; y<triCount; y++)
00162     {
00163         // Set each vertex
00164 
00165         vert0.setValue(vertices[indices[i]].x, vertices[indices[i]].y, vertices[indices[i]].z);
00166 
00167         vert1.setValue(vertices[indices[i+1]].x, vertices[indices[i+1]].y, vertices[indices[i+1]].z);
00168 
00169         vert2.setValue(vertices[indices[i+2]].x, vertices[indices[i+2]].y, vertices[indices[i+2]].z);
00170 
00171         // Add it into the trimesh
00172         trimesh->addTriangle(vert0, vert1, vert2);
00173 
00174         // Increase index count
00175         i+=3;
00176     }
00177 
00178     // --------------- Cleanup
00179 
00180     delete[] vertices;
00181     delete[] indices;
00182 
00183     ///TODO - Check for thread safety
00184     Shape = new btBvhTriangleMeshShape(trimesh, true);
00185 }
00186 
00187 void ActorBase::CreateEntity (PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group)
00188 {
00189     this->entity = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createEntity(name, file, group);
00190 }
00191 
00192 void ActorBase::CreateSceneNode ()
00193 {
00194     this->node = this->GameWorld->OgreSceneManager->createSceneNode();
00195 }
00196 
00197 void ActorBase::SetOgreLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00198 {
00199     this->node->setPosition(Location.GetOgreVector3());
00200 }
00201 
00202 PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetOgreLocation()
00203 {
00204     PhysVector3 temp;
00205     temp.ExtractOgreVector3(this->node->getPosition());
00206     return temp;
00207 }
00208 
00209 void ActorBase::SetBulletLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00210 {
00211     btTransform temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00212     temp.setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00213 }
00214 
00215 PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetBulletLocation()
00216 {
00217     PhysVector3 temp;
00218     btTransform trans = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00219     temp.ExtractBulletVector3(trans.getOrigin());
00220     return temp;
00221 }
00222 
00223 void ActorBase::SetBulletInitLocation (PhysVector3 Location)
00224 {
00225     this->MotionState->initposition.setOrigin(Location.GetBulletVector3());
00226 }
00227 
00228 void ActorBase::SetOgreOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00229 {
00230     this->node->setOrientation(Rotation.GetOgreQuaternion());
00231 }
00232 
00233 void ActorBase::SetBulletOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00234 {
00235     btTransform temp = this->CollisionObject->getWorldTransform();
00236     temp.setRotation(Rotation.GetBulletQuaternion());
00237 }
00238 
00239 void ActorBase::SetLocation (PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z)
00240 {
00241     PhysVector3 temp(x,y,z);
00242     this->SetLocation(temp);
00243 }
00244 
00245 void ActorBase::SetLocation (PhysVector3 Place)
00246 {
00247     this->SetBulletLocation(Place);
00248     this->SetOgreLocation(Place);
00249 }
00250 
00251 PhysVector3 ActorBase::GetLocation()
00252 {
00253     return this->GetBulletLocation();
00254 }
00255 
00256 void ActorBase::SetInitLocation(PhysVector3 Location)
00257 {
00258     this->SetBulletInitLocation(Location);
00259 }
00260 
00261 void ActorBase::SetOrientation (PhysReal x, PhysReal y, PhysReal z, PhysReal w)
00262 {
00263     PhysQuaternion temp(x,y,z,w);
00264     this->SetOrientation(temp);
00265 }
00266 
00267 void ActorBase::SetOrientation (PhysQuaternion Rotation)
00268 {
00269     this->SetBulletOrientation(Rotation);
00270     this->SetOgreOrientation(Rotation);
00271 }
00272 
00273 void ActorBase::AttachToGraphics ()
00274 {
00275     PhysVector3 temp;
00276     temp.ExtractBulletVector3(this->MotionState->initposition.getOrigin());
00277     this->node->setPosition(temp.GetOgreVector3());
00278     this->node->attachObject(this->entity);
00279 }
00280 
00281 void ActorBase::SetKinematic()
00282 {
00283     int x=2;
00284     this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00285 }
00286 
00287 void ActorBase::SetStatic()
00288 {
00289     int x=1;
00290     this->CollisionObject->setCollisionFlags(x);
00291 }

00296 ActorRigid::ActorRigid (PhysReal mass, PhysString name, PhysString file, PhysString group, PhysWorld* World) : ActorBase (name, file, group, World)
00297 {
00298     this->CreateRigidObject(mass);
00299 }
00300 
00301 ActorRigid::~ActorRigid ()
00302 {
00303     delete physrigidbody;
00304 }
00305 
00306 void ActorRigid::CreateRigidObject (PhysReal pmass)
00307 {
00308     btScalar bmass=pmass;
00309     this->physrigidbody = new btRigidBody (bmass, this->MotionState, this->Shape);
00310     CollisionObject=physrigidbody;
00311 }
00312 
00313 void ActorRigid::AddObjectToWorld (PhysWorld *TargetWorld, btSoftRigidDynamicsWorld* World)
00314 {
00315     World->addRigidBody(this->physrigidbody);
00316     AttachToGraphics();
00317 }
00318 
00319 void ActorRigid::CreateShapeFromMesh()
00320 {
00321     this->CreateTrimesh();
00322     this->physrigidbody->setCollisionShape(this->Shape);
00323 }

00356 
00357 PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState()
00358 {
00359     this->initposition.setIdentity();
00360 }
00361 
00362 PhysMotionState::PhysMotionState(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00363 {
00364     this->snode=scenenode;
00365     this->initposition.setIdentity();
00366 }
00367 
00368 PhysMotionState::~PhysMotionState()
00369 {
00370     if (snode!=NULL)
00371     {
00372         delete snode;
00373     }
00374 }
00375 
00376 void PhysMotionState::SetNode(Ogre::SceneNode* scenenode)
00377 {
00378     this->snode=scenenode;
00379 }
00380 
00381 void PhysMotionState::SetPosition(PhysVector3 position)
00382 {
00383     this->initposition.setOrigin(position.GetBulletVector3());
00384 }
00385 
00386 void PhysMotionState::getWorldTransform(btTransform &worldTrans) const
00387 {
00388     worldTrans=initposition;
00389 }
00390 
00391 void PhysMotionState::setWorldTransform(const btTransform &worldTrans)
00392 {
00393     btQuaternion rotation = worldTrans.getRotation();
00394     this->snode->setOrientation(rotation.w(), rotation.x(), rotation.y(), rotation.z());
00395     btVector3 position = worldTrans.getOrigin();
00396     this->snode->setPosition(position.x(), position.y(), position.z());
00397 }
